Text: eztv you are the best, thanks so much for the uploads!! i was wondering why some episodes of the craig ferguson show were missing and if you could upload them too! thank you!
Please, more frequent Ferguson. . can't live without him. .
Yeah, I'm startin' to feel kinda silly begging every week for craig's torrents... but here I am again : please, please somebody upload the late late show, you'll have my undying gratitude.

Wish there was a constant feed of epis, as no channel here airs the show. It's a damn shame 'cause so many other late night shows are constantly uploaded. Big thanks to eztv and other uploaders who every now and then feed us with the best of late night tv =)
